name: Infernal Tiefling
description: Infernal tieflings are the most common variety of tiefling, descended from devils and other lawful fiends. They often exhibit traits associated with fire and brimstone, such as reddish skin tones and horns. Infernal tieflings may possess abilities that reflect their fiery heritage, making them resilient and dangerous adversaries.

traits.Infernal Magic: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the Burning Hands spell with this trait. Starting at 5th level, you can also cast the Flame Blade spell with it. Once you cast Burning Hands or Flame Blade with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
